index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Social and Health Services, to provide financial assistance for comprehensive planning and coordination of social services for the elderly; increasing certain allowances in the 1973 Budget of the Department of Human Resources; abrogating a position and creating certain others, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
